item.title: ‘A Brand New Honkai Game’ teased at Honkai: Star Rail Concert 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/a-brand-new-honkai-game-teased-at-honkai-star-rail-concert-2025

miHoYo teased “a brand new Honkai game” at its Honkai: Star Rail Concert 2025 in Shanghai today.

The teaser trailer shows two creature trainers preparing to engage in a battle.

miHoyo recently filed trademarks for “Honkai: Nexus Anima” in the United States, Europe, Korea (search “넥서스 아니마”), and so on. A potential website and Twitter accounts were also registered, including @HonkaiNA, @HonkaiNA_ID, @HonkaiNA_TH, @HonkaiNA_VN, @HonkaiNA_RU, @HonkaiNA_DE, and @HonkaiNA_FR. While not yet confirmed, this could be the title of the new game.

Watch the teaser trailer below.


Thanks, r/GachaGaming.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail x Fate/stay night [Unlimited Blade Works] collaboration launches July 11
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/honkai-star-rail-x-fate-stay-night-unlimited-blade-works-collaboration-launches-july-11

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

Saber and Archer join the fray.

The July 2024-announced Fate/stay night [Unlimited Blade Works] collaboration for Honkai: Star Rail will launch on July 11 as part of the version 3.6 update, miHoYo announced (2, 3).

Here are the first details:

■ Special Collaboration Warp

“Sweet Dreams and the Holy Grail: Honkai: Star Rail × Fate/stay night [Unlimited Blade Works] Collaboration” will officially launch on July 11.

Starting from July 11 at 12:00 (server time), Trailblazers can use Star Rail Special Passes to participate in the collaboration event and obtain the limited 5-star collaboration characters Saber (Destruction: Wind) and Archer (The Hunt: Quantum)!

This collaboration warp will be available over a long period of time.

*The cumulative warp count for this collaboration warp is calculated independently of other warp types (e.g. “Character Event Warp”). Please stay tuned for future official announcements for more details about the warp details and warp event rules.

Saber

“Are you my master? My sword is yours to command. I will give it my all to bring you victory.”

The solitary Heroic Spirit traverses the long night of fate. The banner of the round table remains unfurled in a dream. Alas, the knight-king of Camelot has yet to reach that ever distant utopia.

Though still a young maiden, she has heeded the call for this most unique iteration of the Holy Grail War. With the Sword in the Stone offering its choice once more, how shall she shatter the illusions of the past?

“The wishes I did not fulfil will end here.”

Archer

“First meeting, huh? Just call me Archer. Lucky for us, we’re not here to kill each other, so let’s keep things civil—if we can.”

Despair plays in cycles from past and future. Countless grand ideals were incinerated before that red and sacred cloth. Yet, do not let this smear of ashes fool you…

Should someone create a phantasmal sweet dream under the guise of false ideals, then he will burn again, facing down the hypocrites of the world till the very end.

No matter where he is, he always remains justice’s steadfast companion.

■ Log In to Claim Archer

After July 11 at 12:00 (server time) and until Version 3.6 ends, Trailblazers can log in to the game to claim the limited 5-star collaboration character, Archer (The Hunt: Quantum), for free!

*Please refer to the follow-up announcements for detailed event rules.

■ Fate/stay night Event

In the planet of dreams, compete to gain the Holy Grail, which can realize all dreams, and summon historical celebrities as Servants – the first Penaconian Holy Grail War is about to begin! And the Trailblazer will be… Player?

From 12:00, July 11 (server time), the “Fate/stay night” event begins. Summon Heroic Spirits, use Command Seals, wield Noble Phantasms, and try different classes to win strategic battles!

*Please refer to the follow-up announcements for detailed event rules.

Honkai: Star Rail is available now for PlayStation 5, PC via client download and Epic Games Store, iOS via App Store, and Android via Google Play.
